website_summaries.verdict: For a flickering flame without actual fire, these charming solar powered lanterns provide perfect ambiance for an evening outdoors.
pros: After six hours of charging in the sun, the faux candles will stay lit for up to 10 hours
Can be used on a tabletop as well
cons: Some users thought they would be larger
Since they come in a set of two, may need several sets for a complete look

website_summaries.verdict: Nice price point for a pair of decorative solar powered lanterns for use while camping or on the deck.
pros: Has a fun design where the light is made to resemble a dancing flame
Includes rings attached to the frames of each light, so you can hang them anywhere
Waterproof materials that will stand up nicely to the environment
cons: Not really made for reading or close-up work
Doesn't have any emergency lighting modes

customer_reviews.title: Built Durable and Operate as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The dancing flames look like these lights are gas operated. They are quite stunning at night. I have them in a front yard flower bed. Purchased in December and I live in Ohio so the direct sunlight has been limited. On a day when it was sunny they operated way into the night. So far I have been pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these. Nice ambience! Smaller than I thought but that’s on me for not reading the description better
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Chesniak

customer_reviews.title: Not the solar of the past.
customer_reviews.text: These are not anything like the flicker torches of the past. Very realistic, great ambience, not too bright and blend in to the effect of the backyard. Really awesome and worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas K.

customer_reviews.title: They Look Like Real Flames
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 and so far 5 of them work - I may have not turned the last one on will give it another shot - liked them so mush I ordered 2 more sets - they are true to the advertisement and look like real flames -
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and relaxing to watch
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I had an issue with one of them. The on/off switch on one was off to the side and could not get it to turn on. I emailed and I got two responses within 24 hours. I am so happy this company stands be hind their product! I got it working and can't wait to order more!
customer_reviews.author: lucy lee

customer_reviews.title: A nice, convincing set of torches
customer_reviews.text: We really like the torch lights. They look much better than the old, standard solar lights. They come almost completely assembled, just put the pole together, and, add ground. The hanging lanterns work well and come with a strong metal clip to attach to something, without worrying about them falling off. The torch effect is very convincing, unlike some other models. The poles for the torches are longer than i would have perferred, but, its easier to cut them than it is to stretch them.
customer_reviews.author: c-i-e-i-o

customer_reviews.title: Work great, match with the larger torch lights.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well overall, but the flame is not as believable or as realistic looking as the tiki style larger torches are. However these seem well built and have functioned so far just as expected. 4 stars because the flickering light motion just doesn't quite seem to nail it as well as the 5 star rated torches do. Still a very fun way to add ambiance with solar power. Definitely not bright enough to be used as a functional light, unless you had 4-5 in close proximity. More to set a mood.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: These lanterns look great in my backyard
customer_reviews.text: These lanterns look great in my backyard. They need direct sunlight to charge though. I thought there was enough sunlight filtering through the trees to charge them. I was wrong. Now that I have that figured out. I charge them on my patio in direct light and hang them on a chain from tree limbs before a party. My wife loves the ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Scott

customer_reviews.title: No stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of the lanterns when lit. Unfortunately, after charging for a day I placed them on my balcony, which they were advertised to accommodate, and within 20 minutes all three went out. I brought them in and after a couple days they once again lit up but only stay lit for approximately 30 minutes despite being recharged all day. They really deserve NO stars but that wasn't an option. Would never recommend to anyone. Very disappointing. Marjean Rowley
customer_reviews.author: Marjean Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, Cannot Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought in July, 2018....it's now Nov, 2018. One of the 2 has already died and the other only stays lit for an hour after a full day of charging in the sun. Too bad......they were really cool while they lasted but I'm not taking anymore chances with them. Like they say, "Fool me once" etc etc.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Decorative Solar Lanterns
customer_reviews.text: These lanterns are so pretty when they light in the evening. The "dancing flames" look like flickering candles and are very attractive. I hope that they will last, as I really am enjoying the look and the effect. The negative comment would be that the lanterns only seem to be staying lit for two-three hours and we have fully charged them. We will try to relocate them during the day to maximize sunlight to see if it extends the working time of the lanterns.
customer_reviews.author: F. Heath

customer_reviews.title: Good when they actually work
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and I really liked the flame effect so I bought two more of them. Unfortunately one of the four does not light up for more than 20-30 mins even tho it gets the same amount of sunshine as the others. Disappointing UPDATE: The other three lanterns only last a few hours most days, if that, and I live in sunny FL. I have solar tiki torches from another place and they last much longer
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great ambiance
customer_reviews.text: Great effects. I also purchased the ones that come as stakes that go into the ground. **pro tip** purchase black, round, rubber coasters to put on top of the stake ones. If you have outdoor lighting they won’t turn on unless you block the top.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 for tryout, and they really work as advertised. Will order 2 more!! In addition we already have 4 torches that look so real, all our neighbors are ordering some.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelis P Nuijten

customer_reviews.title: I think providing the right charging environment is the key thing here for performance.
customer_reviews.text: Gives off a good deal of light in a charming way!! Don't expect to read a book by the amount of light but it can be seen from a distance and that is what I was looking for. I charged for 2 days prior to installing and it went all night with no decrease in brightness. If this continues to perform in this manner over time, then I will be ordering more of these!!! I bought another 2 lights and have to say that it has been a very good purchase. The second set is performing just as well as the first!!!
customer_reviews.author: William Erik Genz

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Great lights! Got 2 & will probably be ordering more. They are perfect around our hot tub in the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cassisa

customer_reviews.title: Very Realistic and Last all night, too
customer_reviews.text: These look marvelous. We also got four of the torch style ones as well. They came on at dusk and stayed on until the wee hours of the morning. I was impressed that they charged so well even with being placed setting on a pergola's bar surface. They charge well without direct sunlight! Very pleased and impressed (thus far). WIFE APPROVED AND HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Davio

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. The solar charge doesn't last long. The solar torches that are similar are nice. "Flame" lasts all night. The small lantern only a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpyface

customer_reviews.title: Good lights.. not as bright as others..
customer_reviews.text: I got these thinking they were the same as my Eoyizw Solar Flame Lights that I had purchased last year and they are not. To begin with, they are about 3/4" shorter and have no chain to hang them from. While the Eoyizw are orange, brighter and look like real flames, these look more like tea lights or votives and have a yellowish tone with a more candle like appearance. They are good lights, just not the best ones I have purchased from an aesthetic standpoint.
customer_reviews.author: SamuraiJack

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last for more than 45 min.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one set and one stopped working if it got jostled. Both only lit up for 45 min. Returned to try another set. Same thing 45 min. Done with them. A different brand on poles I bought work great. Last till sunrise. So I know its these specifically.
customer_reviews.author: Teddybareitall

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much disposable
customer_reviews.text: It really only worked for one summer season. When I took them out for the next summer they no longer turned on or light up. I was careful to turn off and on as to not ruin them. Supposedly there is a year warranty but since they’re out of stock of these products the company is offered for me $10 amazon gift card however this product is nearly $40 so I am unhappy with that. Not a very good warranty service and it was within the year of warranty. I would consider this an expensive disposable product that you shouldn’t get because it doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.author: LolaLauren

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: I had these charging with them turned off for 10 hours in direct sunlight. They’ll maybe stay on 2-3 hours after the sun sets. Not worth the money, buyer be warned!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy W.

customer_reviews.title: Not great. Kinda cheap
customer_reviews.text: I hang these off the back of my boat. So I know I’m subject to loss right away. I have tried a few brands now.. these lights have a nice color and flame. But they don’t last all night long, and they are made of a pretty cheap plastic. They always break right where the hook is at the solar panel. It’s a molded plastic hook and I usually only find the ring hanging and no lantern. So if u plan on hanging them anywhere they might be subject to wind. Like trees, porches.. probably not the best ones to get.
customer_reviews.author: Justin s.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY these
customer_reviews.text: I bought 8 these and hung them outside, let them charge for 48 hours before turning them on. They worked for exactly 1 night and then the next night all where powerless. Shame because the tomcare torches worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: christopher c adams

customer_reviews.title: they are great. the alligater clips hold sturdy and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I let them charge for a day then waited to see how they worked. they are great. the alligater clips hold sturdy and they are light enough that I didn't worry about hanging it on some paracord. I can't wait for halloween, (that is what I really got them for) they will look great hanging in the tunnel. I may have to order a few more
customer_reviews.author: John Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Don't get fleeced
customer_reviews.text: The lanterns are OK, but somewhat small. The problem I have is with pricing, These are not worth the price that they are being sold for at Amazon by Tomcare. They are available for half the price at Tomcare web site. This is absolutely terrible on both on the part of Amazon and Tomcare. Please do your search prior to buying and pay the right price. I would not buy a Tomcare product again
customer_reviews.author: graden

customer_reviews.title: I love looking at these lights!
customer_reviews.text: These are priced slightly higher than others, reason is these come with an extra extension pole for added height. I like that the stakes are separate from the poles. I put a small piece of cardboard over the stake then hammered them in for easy straight setting. I have 4 and am seriously considering another 4 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K. Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Best solar lights I've EVER owned!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are AMAZING! I can't even describe how awesome they are. They look just like real fire. I'm going to order more, I want them all over my yard. They last all night too. When I get up in the morning (5am) the lights are STILL ON! They are quality products, built to last a lifetime. I highly recommend them. They are worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: midwest josie

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: The two lanterns I ordered were properly packed when I received them, and look very well made and feel solid. They certainly added a certain ambience to the small "green area" that I have just outside the front door. Singapore weather has been fickle recently though, with days of strong sunshine followed by heavy downpours. So not sure if that is the reason why the lights went dark a day ago, and have not shone since. Will wait for a couple of days of sunny days to see what gives. Nonetheless, am happy overall with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tan Kheng Lai

customer_reviews.title: Great decorative lighting accent for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: The lights are very nice and contemporary looking. I haven't hung them yet but if they are anything like the solar dusk to dawn lights for in the ground, I'm sure i will be very satisfied. The lights charge very well and depending on the amount of sun holds the charge. I'm hoping the in ground solar flame lights will be back on Amazon again soon, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased 8 of the torches and 4 of the lanterns. One of the lanterns didn't flicker so I contacted TomCare customer service. I received a response right away. The lanterns were out of stock, but was told that they would send me one as soon as it was available - and they did! I'm very satisfied. 4 of the torches that we have are on their second year and they work just as well now as when they were brand new.
customer_reviews.author: PortlandLisa

customer_reviews.title: Quite Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: These lights arrived quickly, were well packaged, and easy to hang. They have a lovely amber flicker that truly does look like there is a flame in the torch. I've only had them out for a few days, but they come on at dark and last well past midnight (I fell asleep at 1a and they were still going strong). Very pleased - good value for the price. They are plastic - so I will update my review if they don't stand the test of time! I have them hanging on metal shepherd hooks around the hot tub. Great ambiance!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nash

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these for my deck, and got 2 for my sister's pool area. May need more. *LOL* I'm a solar nut, and love solar lights. These are bright and beautiful, look like real flame and last all night! Very classy, not obnoxious. Just really pretty and add a sparkle to whatever your outdoor area is.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine E. Roush

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the compact style,strong construction and great flaming presentation. I have 69 single solar yard lights around my house in 12 different styles. I must say this one is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: DL  OKC

customer_reviews.title: really enjoy these "dancing lights"!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style, movement, clip for hanging, and ambience they create. I did not like the challenge of knowing how to initially charge/use as the switch is unclear and 2 of the 4 I ordered did not "dance" after the first week - although they were returned and the 2 newly ordered ones work great! Overall a great purchase and value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 year is what you can expect
customer_reviews.text: Worked for only one season. Disassembled and found the battery fully charged so the quality of the build was the issue. Too much money for only one season. I can’t continue to buy $100-200 per year to replace all the lights. Considering doing research on hardwired lights.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Best solar lights I’ve ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!! It looks gorgeous all night long! They are never dull. I have 4 and even bought the torches to go with it. I have received nothing but compliments. I had one small issue and costumer service went above and beyond to fix it. I couldn’t recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made overall.
customer_reviews.text: If the bulb were to burn out or break it doesn’t look like I could I could change it. I can only access the battery compartment. Or if I wanted to replace the bulb with an upgraded one it may not be possible. It does not use standard AA, AAA, C, D or 9 volt batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice glow!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the lanterns for about a week, but I have six of the torches that I've had for quite a while now and they look like real fire and are reliable as heck. They are not a lot of light, but that's not what you would purchase them for. They are a nice ambience.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Luver

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: One of the lights worked for less than a week. I returned them for a refund. They were not as bright as I would have liked but I would have kept them if it wasn't for the one not working. I also ordered a pair of solar tiki torch style solar lights and the color and brightness are way better.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Lights look cool when they work
customer_reviews.text: Update: I contacted the seller and they sent me 3 replacements, even though I'm just past the 30 warranty. I just put them outside so I'm not sure how they are working. I will update if I have any more issues. I loved these lights when we first got them. I have had them for just over 1 month and 3 out of 4 have stopped flickering. They still light up but do not flicker. Of course I am just past the 30 day warranty window. So now they look stupid as only 1 flickers and the other 3 don't (we have them on all 4 corners of our pool). Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Sheets

customer_reviews.title: These lights don't hold charge well...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful lights and TomCare's customer service is excellent. I had a problem with one light and they replaced it for me. However the batteries do not charge well, as I have had to replace them several times now...
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: cute lanterns, but...
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine received these lanterns for a Christmas gift. I loved them so I purchased some too. I just used mine for the first time this week-end. One of the lights quit working shortly after being turned on (they had been solar charged). My friend also had a problem with one of her lights working... Not sure what the issue is but I am somewhat disappointed in the performance of these lanterns. Cute, but not dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Effect
customer_reviews.text: A bit small but look really great. My son has had these sitting on his outside table for some time with no problems. Mine are hanging on each side of a storage shed door near the pool. Difficult to tell if the little On/Off switch is set correctly but that is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Flickering Lanterns do not work have been under direct sunlight for 24 hours?
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say but these lanterns do not work I gave them a good chance to 2 days of sun light, they come on but off in less than an hour. When they do work they are pretty the flickering looks like real. But unfortunately they do not work!
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and stays lit for hours!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Put one on each side of the garden and they light right up. They’re next to our fire pit and are still lit up when I leave for work at 5 am in the morning. Very neat lights!!!
customer_reviews.author: john schindler

customer_reviews.title: Decorative and nice glow in the garden
customer_reviews.text: The original order had two defective lamps. Amazon exchanged them and the new set is fine so far. The lamps are very pretty but are not a solid construction like other solar lamps I have purchased. Everything is plastic. However they do look nice and as long as they continue to have a dancing flame and work I will be happy. I have only had them a week so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought 30 of these lanterns last year. All still work beautifully. I bought 6 this year, and all are dead after 3 months (all 36 from this and last year are outside). This year's version, which has a slightly yellower hue, seem to suffer quality or manufacturing control. ----- update: the vendor immediately replaced all 6 faulty lanterns. Will test them out and if they last until next year would rate them as 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brent L.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about 3 days
customer_reviews.text: They worked wonderfully for a few days. Then on about day 4 they would come on for about an hour then turn off. It's like the battery didn't charge - but they were out all day in the blazing FL sun.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Ambiance plus.
customer_reviews.text: These look awesome net to my outdoor spa. Very realistic flame motion. Last a long time on a charge from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl G

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for 5 months and they have already quite working. Not a inexpensive item to start with and can’t even return for an exchange. Also found that ALL of the screws on both lanterns have been tampered with so I can’t even try to change out the battery. Crap purchase
customer_reviews.author: louann

customer_reviews.title: I like my new lanterns
customer_reviews.text: I like my new lanterns ! We even set them in the fireplace for a little ambiance since it’s too hot for a real fire. Plan on taking them camping next month 😊
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Nice Special Effect
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with these hanging solar lanterns. They add a layer of fire torch effect around the campsite, but are not quite special enough to carry the full weight of that look. Much improved when used in conjunction with other similar type tiki torches.
customer_reviews.author: Dragnet

customer_reviews.title: Very unique and long lasting light!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these lanterns!! They give off a wonderful flickering warm light that is so beautiful at night. Plus the light lasts a long time too! I highly recommend these to anyone who is looking for great quality and wonderful ambiance!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if product quality is there. Gonna reach out to seller and will update my review.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure i like this i purchased 10 of them then we decided to get 4 more. Been hanging for 2 days amd already 2 of them are not working. Picture shows 1 working and 1 5 feet above not working. Both were charged in sun with power button on. Both get same sun exposure. Not sure i am happy with them product if they are already failing. Where i have them hanging is to much work to constantly be messing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Slizzal

customer_reviews.title: Very responsible company to work with!!! Great products!
customer_reviews.text: I initially had a small issue at first, that this company corrected immediately ! Everything is working great, the lanterns light up my screen room, and I have a dozen torches that have been working great, for many weeks now, nestled among many palms all over the yard. Tropical paradise!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but really tiny.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. but really really small. We were disappointed, but I guess it's our fault for not reading the small print. They do work as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Rodentia

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for Halloween decoration now and for back yard ambience next summer. Set up is simple: turn them on and set them in the sun. Amazingly, it looks like real flames, but it is safe because it is LED lights doing some kind of magic.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie-Anne

customer_reviews.title: corrected review
customer_reviews.text: i originally gave this product 3 stars. Not because it wasn't as described or wasn't completely beautiful but that I had had an issue with one of the lights. It went to a steady glow instead of a flame. Right after my review I received an email from the company offering to replace the light. I received the replacement right away. Very impressed with the lights but more importantly the company. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hopp

customer_reviews.title: Review for Bright Zeal solar flower lights
customer_reviews.text: Lights are great. They last a long time at night. The light stakes you can make long or short. I like that they change color. This company had great customer service. I had a minor order problem but they treated it as a major error on their part ( which it was not) and went out of their way to correct it. I would definitely order from Bright Zeal again.
customer_reviews.author: Danpsyc

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly flamelike!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these lights, and watched them fire up as the sun went down. They are marvelous ambient lighting fixtures, and the imitation flame effect is very realistic. I will be using them to mark pathways on the property.
customer_reviews.author: Avi du Jour

customer_reviews.title: Make sure they work before you give them as a present
customer_reviews.text: I should have checked them sooner since this was a Birthday present for my brother! I purchased two of the and one does not flicker as advertised. His Birthday is in 3 days, bummer.
customer_reviews.author: richard barr

customer_reviews.title: Great company to do business with!
customer_reviews.text: The flickering of the fire in the lantern looks very realistic. looking. We placed the lanterns on our decks and take them camping with us. We enjoyed them so much we placed a 2nd order.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working completely after three weeks in direct sunlight. Had to go out every night and push the on off button to make them come on and then even that didn’t work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color... I really like the flicker. From 15 feet... it looks like a pretty convincing flame. Everything was great... 2 weeks in, one of them just holds a solid light now. It no longer flickers. I'm pretty happy but bummed that one them conked out. Oh well... they are pretty cool. Update: The seller replaced the defective light. Sometimes things don't work, but the seller immediately took responsibility and sent a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Love these lights, they look like real fire. I have had a lot if people stop and tell me they are awesome. You can hang them or put them on a table
customer_reviews.author: Carole Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights...
customer_reviews.text: I have the Tomcare solar lights hanging in my backyard and I simply love them (flickering flame). I will order more to put in the front yard. I received them before the arrival date given. They are well made and very easy to hang. You don’t have to put anything together, just hang them up. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ondrea E.

customer_reviews.title: Short run time
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but it only runs 2 hrs. Have order other TomCare lights and didn’t have this issue. Yes it’s November but I live In Fl so getting enough sun isn’t the problem. Would return but I threw Out the box trusting they would be like other TomCare lights I’ve ordered....maybe I got a bad bunch?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool lights!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flame - these lights are very unique. They do need to be outside for solar recharging - window inside house isn't always enough light but I keep them on the deck and bring them inside the sun room for ambiance. It rains a lot here and they really are waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Ro from SC

customer_reviews.title: Great value: excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: These are EXCELLENT solar lights. Their flickering feature makes them as interesting as they are attractive. Friends have ordered them after seeing mine and are equally pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Love these lanterns
customer_reviews.text: I love these lanterns, and I also bought the torches. They are well worth the price and the patio is beautiful at night. The customer follow up is also great.
customer_reviews.author: ohva

customer_reviews.title: Realistic - Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love the flickering effect of these lights. It does look like a flame flickering. I enjoy looking at them every night. Also they stay on several hours each night. They are on when I go to bed in the evening and some may still be on when I get up in the morning. I have 7 Tom Care lights. 5 laterns and 2 torches. 5 of them I have had almost a year. Two of them I added about 3 months ago. All still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Barry G. Waters

customer_reviews.title: I need a proper response from customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I thought they would be a true quality product. One lantern did not work. Got a boiler plate response from the seller. I am waiting for a more detailed resonse or I will return them. Very, very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: 5 Happy Keeshonds

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in Feburary as a Mother's Day gift for mom and they worked for about a week and one stopped working and the other just stopped as well. Because I didn't report the problem until May when she got them,there isn't anything that can be replaced. Almost 40.00 lesson is never buy a gift three months in advance. With all the great reviews, I would be one that can't give a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Meh.  Better options available.  Exaggerated photo
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading photo. Nothing special about these lights. Much nicer options with far more realistic flame effect for the same $$ or less available
customer_reviews.author: mike d

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and with solar no batteries required.
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. Actually I loved them enough to purchase a second set to have on the front patio as well as the original set I purchased for the back patio. The flame looks so real.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Out of 8 sets of 2, one pair does not work
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 8 pairs, all worked except 2, can not find how to contact seller for replacements
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Sorrentino

customer_reviews.title: Great Accent Lighting
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these previously to see if they live up to the description and we have been very pleasantly surprised. As a result we recently purchased four more. They last throughout the night and very much look like actual flames. Great to sit outside on a nice night and enjoy the evening. Occasionally we also light Tiki Torches to add to the ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Rofu52

customer_reviews.title: Solar lanterns worked fine for 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Solar lanterns worked fine for 2 days. Now they may come on for a few hours and quit functioning. The lanterns get plenty of sun here in the Florida, however, they don't last the evening. I won't purchase another set in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MIchael Starks

customer_reviews.title: Tom Care Solar Lanterns
customer_reviews.text: They do not have dancing flames like the torch lights I already purchased and not as advertised. Very disappointed in these lanterns! I would return them except I threw the box away expecting them to work. Still have not received new ones as promised! Even chatted with customer service. This is my second review. RJM
customer_reviews.author: Bunny J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flame, Lousy Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the lanterns, but it looks like it's some more cheap crap from overseas. One of them quit working after only 3 weeks. I don't know if it might be they just put cheap batteries in them or not, but I really don't want to open them to trouble shoot. I think I'll just send them back. I really love the lantern flame effect of the lights though. They were lovely (for a short while). Update: I have sent the first ones back for return and ordered a new pair. We'll see how these do. I'll be back.
customer_reviews.author: PJ70

customer_reviews.title: Great little flame cages
customer_reviews.text: Great little solar lights good for ambiance lighting for barbecues or camping not extremely bright the gives the real flame effect.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Terry

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement for traditional candle lanterns on deck
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to hang and never have to worry about again. I was surprised how good the flame effect works/looks. I may get more of these if they continue to perform. If I could be granted a wish to make these even better it would just be that they perhaps look a bit more like a traditional lantern in shape and style.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Nich.

customer_reviews.title: they look like real torch lights
customer_reviews.text: These look like real. Mine haven't keep a charge for about 5 hours but likely because they don't get full exposure all day. Everyone comments on them. The rings and clips are removable so they work nicely on a table top.
customer_reviews.author: Kath-a-lou

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but flicker died on two of them.
customer_reviews.text: They are really fun. It’s nice to see the flicker on our front deck. But two of four already stopped flickering. They still light but no fun flicker.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Battery problem
customer_reviews.text: The first night the lights lasted about 10 hours, The 2nd & 3rd night they only lasted about 2 hours. Original we wanted 8 lights but purchased 2 to see how we liked them. The first night we loved them, but after the 2nd 3rd night we decided they had a problem
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Work Well
customer_reviews.text: Although they may look a bit goofy, I enjoy these flickering lights. Compared to other solar products, these work well and are worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Philip L. Gissen

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice gift. A couple of short shepherd's hooks would complete the gift although one can also hang them on a post or wall.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Leon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. They look like real candles
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. They look like real candles. We have so much rain we can't use real flame outside. These work great.
customer_reviews.author: Russell S. Bundy

customer_reviews.title: TomCare lanterns are amazing, I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these look and I bought 2 packages for a total of 4 lanterns. Unfortunately 2 of them had issues and didn't work, but TomCare stood behind their products and sent me two new ones. I'm impressed by the lanterns and the company. I highly recommend buying from TomCare.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product with one exception
customer_reviews.text: These lanterns are great, provide an interesting table top lighting option for our patio. I previously order the torches which were also a great addition to our patio lightning. My only issue is one of the 6 lanterns I received would not charge (defective). I emailed the seller about how to return it and get a replacement and have yet to get a response. For that, I have reduced the overall rating to 4.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Howard

customer_reviews.title: Worked 1 day
customer_reviews.text: One of 2 stopped flickering in one day and would just light up with no flame effect . I have about 30 TomCare Solar torches and they have all been good until this set .
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Realistic and consistent quality
customer_reviews.text: This was probably my 5th order, maybe 6th for these lanternsfrim TomCare. I have tried other brands but always come back for these! They are awesome. They look just like a real flame. These are my go-to gift now. Everyone loves them as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They didnt work
customer_reviews.text: They didnt stay lite long .they came on and went out .. i sent them back .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No flames
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these along with the torch lights and the torch lights work beautifully but these lanterns not so much. I had to return the first set as they did not flame jut light up. Amazon sent me a whole new set and the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Klein

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lights love the flame affect
customer_reviews.text: Nice Lights love the flame affect. I switched out the clips and hung them from a chain for and added effect. One thing is the lights seem to hang slightly tilted even with the clips otherwise they look great. Shipping was fine, received the lights in 2 days with no issue. Looking to buy more for the RV.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE the lights
customer_reviews.text: The lights looks like real flickering flames. Absolutely LOVE them. We also love they last for hours. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NeedleGuy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Moving Flames
customer_reviews.text: These lanterns are downright amazing. The flames look real from every angle. I love how the lanterns hang, the design and that they look like real fire hanging from the fence post. I highly recommend these lanterns.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very cool lights, excellent so far, they can be placed almost anywhere, you can even bring them indoors at night
customer_reviews.author: Motomike

customer_reviews.title: beautiful lights
customer_reviews.text: I hung them on my bird feeder pole. I have some that stake in the ground so it all looks very nice. I just wish the hanging ones were a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: TomCare Solar Lights Solar Lanterns Dancing Flame Outdoor Hanging Lanterns Lights Decoration Lighting Solar Powered Waterproof Umbrella Lanterns Night Light Auto Sensor for Garden Patio Yard (2)
feature_bullets: Flickering Flames Design: The distinctive dancing flame is attractive, which looks like the real flame; The warm yellow light creates a welcoming ambience. This flicker candle effect solar light will be the best choice for a alternative candle lantern.

Solar-powered: This lantern light is solar powered, no wires needed, just put it under the sunshine to absorb the solar energy, then the solar panel will transfer the solar energy into electricity. It is really energy-saving and help you save money.

Long Working Time: With high efficient solar panel, after being fully charged under the direct sunlight, the candle light can last 10 hours. Charging time: 6 hours. Note: working time and charging time will be influenced by weather condition, season.

Easy Installation: Equipped with a durable hanging lamp and a circular ring, this solar lantern light can be hung or clip on anywhere you want. Also, it will automatically turns on at dusk and off at dawn. No need to operate ON/OFF switch once put it into use, which brings you convenience and saves your time.

Waterproof & Guaranteed: Made of durable and waterproof ABS plastic, no more worries about raining, snowing and frosting, perfect for outdoor use. Also, we provide 45 days money back and 12 months warranty. Purchase with worry free!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars595 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
